place: Via S. Nicolò 30, II°, Trieste, Austria
author: James Joyce
text: Dear Mr Grant Richards, I shall write you a letter in a few days about another matter as soon as I have received an answer from Mr Symons to whom I wrote yesterday. As for Chamber Music of course you may keep it until you can see your way to have it published for me. I am very much obliged to you for your kind letter. Faithfully yours Jas A Joyce
